description:
Kogoro is hired by Chokai, the son of the distinguished Chokai Conglomerate family, to find his missing fiance. Kogoro and Conan discover that she called her landlady to tell her she was moving and her boss to say she was quitting her job. As their investigation progresses, they decide to meet with an old woman named Shigemi, the last person to see Motoko. Kogoro determines that Shigemi killed Motoko to get her out of the way, but Conan feels as though the investigation is going a little too smoothly...
Source: crunchyroll
